2040040864.resolved_title: Ad Hominem: When People Use Personal Attacks in Arguments
2040040864.excerpt: An ad hominem argument is a personal attack against the source of an argument, rather than against the argument itself. Essentially, this means that ad hominem arguments are used to attack opposing views indirectly, by attacking the individuals or groups that support these views.
